data.title: Shamari Fears Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Shamari Fears on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Shamari Fears including Couples Retreat and The Encore.
data.text: Shamari DeVoe is an American singer. She is best known as the lead singer of the early 2000s pop/R&B girl group Blaque. DeVoe portrayed Lava in the comedy film Bring It On. She has also appeared on the Bravo reality television series The Real Housewives of Atlanta for its eleventh season; and the VH1 series Couples Retreat alongside her husband R&B singer Ronnie DeVoe.
